mapper.delete: delete from commentinfo where comment_id = #{comment_id} or reply_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from commentinfo where comment_create_time > (select comment_read_time from notifiinfo where user_id = #{user_id} ) and author_id = #{user_id}
select * from commentinfo where article_id = #{article_id} ORDER BY -comment_id ASC
select * from commentinfo where author_id = #{user_id} order by -comment_id asc limit #{start},#{pagesize}
